result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alexander Lamoyne Stockland

records.addlTxt:
10:39 AM Defendant Alexander Lamoyne Stockland not in court.  Attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore in court for Alexander Lamoyne Stockland.  Attorney Joseph M. Schieffer in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Larimore: Defendant is in custody in St Croix County. Reset the plea. Court approves zoom for Defendant and Atty Larimore. Atty Larimore to file plea questionnaire and waiver of personal appearance.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 3, 2023 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on January 3, 2023 at 10:30 am.

2:03 PM Alexander Lamoyne Stockland does not appear in Court,  Atty Joel Kenneth Larimore, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Larimore states DE is in custody in St. Croix County. ADA Schieffer would like to set a Plea and Sentencing. Atty Larimore to file a preliminary waiver before the plea. Court adjourned at 2:07 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 6, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on September 9, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

from Ct Comm Gavic to SPD letter "The Hearing is to be conducted as scheduled, but as a status conf. Atty. Larimore may attend via tele. should he so choose. JRG"

per JRG 8/12/22 - reset the STC - E: DA & Atty. eif
from SPD requesting to have preliminary hearing rescheduled with Atty Larimore.
from Ct Comm Gavic to SPD letter "Request Granted. JRG"
Preliminary hearing on August 12, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
from SDP requesting another status conference to allow time to appoint an attorney
Status conference on July 12, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Court finds Defendant freely, intelligently, knowingly, and understandingly made and waives constitutional right to those time requirements.
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Not to possess controlled substances without a valid prescription.

3:48 PM Defendant Alexander Lamoyne Stockland appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Liesl E. Nelson appears by phone, ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Walker is requesting a $2,500.00 SIBS w/conditions of AS & Not to possess controlled subs., no objectiion. Court so orders.  DE does not qualify for PD. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:54 pm.  Status conference scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
